questionTitle: Our house isn't difficult to find: it's ________ St.Mary's Church.
A lot of my friends have ________ smoking in the last few years.
Tell me ________ there is anything special that you would like to do.
I'm making you responsible for this project. Please see ________ it that it is finished on time.
He suggested ________ to the cinema together.
According to the forecast it will be mostly cloudy, with ________ of rain in the north.
My parents ________ very strongly of people who smoke.
She bought a new ________ for the party.
When our company got a new computer, I had to ________ a course in programming.
This morning's history lesson seemed to go ________.
I know him by ________, but I have no idea what his name is.
The car burst into ________ but the driver managed to escape.
I know he is slow ________ understanding, but you have to be patient with him.
I'll be absent ________ class tomorrow.
It gives me ________ to introduce our today's speaker, Professor Smith.
They ________ in Poland for more than three weeks now.
Look, Officer, I am not drunk. I am as ________ as a judge.
The working atmosphere has gone downhill since you joined. You have a lot to ________ for.
The fact that the office was totally disorganized was more indication of the ________ of the new manager and of the ________ of the person who had admired him.
a sore point = ________.
anwers: a matter that irritates or hurts when it is brought up
an unpleasant situation that one has to deal with
a very dangerous crossroads, where many accidents
